detectors.description:
BitcoinGold.buyToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcoinGold.sol#243-248) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-newTokens = SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.div(msg.value,tokenSalePrice),1e18) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcoinGold.sol#245)
detectors.markdown:
[BitcoinGold.buyToken()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcoinGold.sol#L243-L248) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[newTokens = SafeMath.mul(SafeMath.div(msg.value,tokenSalePrice),1e18)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BitcoinGold.sol#L245)
